author: Daemon Capital
title: Democratised AlgoTrading on Cardano
description: Classic blockchain rewards focus on market making fees, PoS rewards & lending, leaving a big revenue area of automated trading untapped.

assessments.note: The proposal effectively addresses the challenge but it is lacking documentation. Please create an actual WP.

This proposal is a great and complex implementation that improve dramatically the transactions volume on Cardano blockchain, because DeFi (liquidity providing and farming) applications attract enormous amounts of users and monetary value. The proposal clearly articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for the stakeholders (in deep detail for users, traders and so on.. ). However the objective of the proposal not only related to Cardano but versus other PoS Blockchain.

Case not clearly made on how this benefits end users. These types of strategies would definitely benefit the traders who are followed. It is basically a system that automatically enables those traders to front-run their followers. They will always buy and sell before their followers. The bigger this gets the more unstable it will make the ecosystem enable pump and dump by the traders who are followed.
This proposal took the challenge and applied a real world lens to it. As well gave proof of concept with examples.
Awesome work. A great  proposal that will engage more users for services and more adoption of the cardano ecosystem
Proposal is for the development of a trading dApp with automated strategies mirroring top traders

Congratulations. For me it is one of the plans being described perfectly.  It will have to compete with a number of other systems of the same kind, bt this proposal fits in the idea of Cardano, well thought and careful design
The problem was stated clearly and the solution of using automated trading was explained thoroughly. There is even a whitepaper posted.

The proposal team is completed skilled and have a good trade-off  between business and technical knowledge, so in my opinion will able to make surely a good pilot or MVP (I have 20 years experienced in information technology related to financial services industry). In relation to the possible success of the initiative, I think that trading functionalities are incredible evolving in the market during the last years, so there are a lot of possibilities for the adoption by the traders and by financial institutions. Further I think it's important to improve details about the process related to the issue related to the market or capital risk.
It appears the proposers have not yet figured out how they are going to implement this so it is hard to guarantee they will be successful in implementation.
The plan as presented demonstrates high quality work with an emphasis on proving itself as viable. This proof is cited.
The presentation is almost perfect and obviously there is capacity and experience to deliver this project and when necessary get more expertise.
Team behind the proposal has extensive market making experience and a complete project plan.

Documentation is excellent and descibes all phases correctly and proportional. It will take a year before fully operational and the funds requested are in line or even below what I think will be needed to create the project. I have a feeling that testing the system will require more time (and money).
I think that the roadmap is a good map for success but there needs to be more contingency planning and risk analysis done.

The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones and a defined time horizon. The only thing I miss in this area is that the proposer has not mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them.. The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work. The proposer has considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation

More detail on exactly how the algorithms will be implemented, and how they will choose the followers should be detailed. THe proposer should also make more of a case as to why this type of fund is beneficial to users and highlight some of the risk entailed in following this type of strategy and how they could minimise them (ie front running and pump and dump issues).
This proposal as presented makes sense and seems very viable. I am just looking for more information on the team..
There is a well presented road map and milestones that can be used to track the progress of the project.
There is sufficient information, including updates, to enable auditing of this proposal.

solution: Develop automated ML trading ensemble method based on following top K=100 traders centralised exchange accounts and wallets.
experience: Years of experience building and leading front-office teams in top market makers and investment banks. CS & Quantitative Finance degrees.
